modName: Dragon Priest Mask of the Sith Lord
summary:
This is a retexture of a Dragon Priest Mask, based on Star Wars Knights of the Old Republic 2: The
Sith Lords.
descriptionHtml:
Well, aren\'t there a lot of Star Wars fans like me that plays Skyrim?! So, I decided to add a feature of the old republic, a Dragon Priest Mask, based on Darth Nihilus Mask. (it\'s beta yet).
Of course, as fan of the Sith characters, partial fan of  the Jedi,  this mod works fine with the              retexture of Black Mage Robes, included in the file, I hope you enjoy!!!

just open the console, (hit  \\  key), then type:

player.placeatme 000c2cd6 1  it will appears a dwemer box with all standard armor ( dragon priest mask). If anybody knows if there is a Battle Mage custom class for Skyrim, let me know, because it will be perfect for a sith character.

NOTE: Due the retexture of the dragon priest hood, to turn it black, it\'s very common that other dragon priest hoods become black as well, not all, some of them.

and then, type:  player.placeatme 000c2cd8 1, it will appears another dwemer box with all clothing ( black boots and black robes or black mage robes), the glove of the vampires of Dawnguard suits fine. kill a vampire and take his gloves!
author: Darth Felsus
